code: import React from"react";import Details from"./Details";import Cast from"./Cast";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import ReviewsComponent from"../(utils)/ReviewsComponent";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import Videos from"./Videos";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const moviesReviews=useSelector(state=>state.movie.moviesReviews.data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-10 pl-10 pr-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Details,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"opacity-40"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cast,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(id,"/cast"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-bold font-serif text-xl bg-gray-800 p-1 rounded",children:"Full Cast & Crew"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"opacity-40"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-yellow-500 p-1 rounded-xl font-bold text-xl text-black font-serif",children:"Reviews"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReviewsComponent,{data:moviesReviews.slice(0,2),movieReview:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(id,"/review"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-gray-500 p-1 rounded-xl font-bold text-xl text-black font-serif",children:"See all Reviews"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"opacity-40"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-yellow-500 p-1 rounded-xl font-bold text-xl text-black font-serif",children:"Videos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"opacity-40"})]});};export default MovieDetails;
